programme.title: The End of the Eighties - Great or Greedy?
programme.short_synopsis: Does the end of the Reagan era mean an end to the culture of greed of the 1980s?
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke muses on the end of the Reagan era and a collective shift away from the greed of the 'me' decade.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
